foreignData.name: Hüter der Bestien
foreignData.text: {G}, {T}: Bringe einen Bestien-Spielstein ins Spiel. Behandle diesen Spielstein wie eine 2/2 grüne Kreatur. Benutze diese Fähigkeit nur, wenn ein Gegner Deiner Wahl mehr Kreaturen kontrolliert als Du.

name: Keeper of the Beasts
originalText:
o
G, oc
T: Put a Beast token into play. Treat this token as a 2/2 green creature. Play this ability only if target opponent controls more creatures than you.

rulings.text: A different opposing player may be targeted each time the ability is activated.
It is only necessary that the condition be true as you activate the ability. The ability will still resolve normally even if the condition is no longer true at that time.

text: {G}, {T}: Choose target opponent who controlled more creatures than you did as you activated this ability. Create a 2/2 green Beast creature token.
